abstract: The power producer NextEra Energy wants to buy the bankrupt company’s 80 percent stake in the power transmission group Oncor Electric Delivery.
snippet: The power producer NextEra Energy wants to buy the bankrupt company’s 80 percent stake in the power transmission group Oncor Electric Delivery.
lead_paragraph: The long, sad saga of TXU may finally be heading toward a conclusion. The power producer NextEra Energy is buying the bankrupt company’s 80 percent stake in the power transmission group Oncor Electric Delivery, valued at $18.4 billion.

headline.main: Next Step in TXU Bankruptcy Is Up to the Courts and Regulators
